snippet.title: 'Purr'fect Black Cat Pops
snippet.description:
* 'Purr'fect Black Cat Pops Video
* Giada at Home * Giada De Laurentiis * (04:16)
Giada's Black Cat Pops are a 'purr'fect sweet-treat Halloween party favor.

snippet.description:

Don't crack under pressure! In the first test of genius, the chefs must cook frozen desserts that include hard-boiled eggs. But they...
